Washington, D.C., 1969) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí
E nyèrè ya nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Atlanta College of Art na 1992 na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts site na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na 1995
Usoro nka ya gụnyere eserese, foto, nka kọmputa, vidiyo, na egwu elektrọnik
Ọ bụ ịhụnanya ya màkà jazz na egwu elektrọnik na-akwalite ihe oyiyi Dixon
Ọ na-enyocha njikọ kinetic na ụdị abstract ya ma gosipụta mmetụta siri ike nké nka Africa na ngosipụta abstract.
Dixon malitere igosi na 1991 mgbè ọ bi na Atlanta, Georgia, wee daa na ihe nkírí nka na Chicago na BAREWALLS 2000, ihe ngosi nka dị ndụ nkè ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Art Institute of Chicago haziri
Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na ọha na eze enwetala ọrụ ya, dị ka Sandor Collection na Chicago, The School of The Art Institute of Chicago, na David C
Driskell Center na Mahadum Maryland na College Park.
